title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Flipped Learning for Visual Literacy and Game-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Design a visual literacy assessment rubric based on the flipped learning model.
Apply gamification elements to digital educational objects (DEOs) across at least three language learning scenarios.
Develop and implement PBL projects reflecting Visual Literacy (VL) Standards at each stage of the ADDIE model.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
